channel.title: the metrosound podcast
channel.description: welcome to the metrosound podcast. the progressive house music podcast since 2006. grab a new full-length mix free every month featuring the latest underground progressive house music. all metrosound mixes contain no talk, no ads, just music. all tracks selected and mixed by richard b. full track listings at www.metrosound.co.uk/podcast/
channel.itunes:subtitle: welcome to the metrosound podcast. the progressive house music podcast since 2006. grab a new full-length mix free every month featuring the latest underground progressive house music. all metrosound mixes contain no talk, no ads, just music. all tracks selected and mixed by richard b. full track listings at www.metrosound.co.uk/podcast/

item.title: half hour of house : s06-e07 summer special
item.description: the 2011 - 07 july summer special edition. welcome to the metrosound podcast : half hour of house. the progressive house music podcast since 2006. grab a new 30 minute preview mix free every month featuring the latest underground house music in the mix. Or head over to metrosound.co.uk and gain access to the full hour+ version only available on the website. Members can access full length versions as standard and can also download the extras edition featuring additional mixes that compliment the podcast, are only available to members and won't feature as part of the podcast. all metrosound mixes contain no talk, no ads, just music. all tracks selected and mixed by richard b. full track listings and more at www.metrosound.co.uk/podcast/
